original_text: But when the Jews saw the crowds, they were filled with jealousy and began to contradict what was spoken by Paul, reviling him.
korean_text: 유대인들이 그 무리를 보고 시기가 가득하여 바울이 말한 것을 반박하고 비방하거늘

sentences.original_text: But when the Jews saw the crowds,
and began to contradict what was spoken by Paul,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바울이 말한 것을 반박하기 시작했습니다
